name: Daleks - By Nello Galiano (C64 2022)
description:
DALEKS by Nello Galiano (! NG73)

Destroy all the daleks by making them collide with each other or with the debris.

Use the joystick in port 2 to move.

Attention: you can only move up, down, right and left, NOT diagonally.Daleks, on the other hand, can move diagonally. Hide behind barriers and obstacles.Use the "T" KEY to teleport to a random spot in the surrounding space. You have 9 space teleporters for life.
Enter the tardis to move to the other time period; here too you will find daleks to destroy.
When you change epochs by entering the tardis, the debris from the epoch of departure vanishes and you will not be able to exploit it to destroy the remaining daleks.

To go to the next level you have to destroy all the daleks of the two dimensions.
You have 5 lives available; you lose one when you collide with daleks or wrecks.

The demo has 9 levels. At each level the number of daleks increases.

Credits: sound effects by Hein Holt
